reviewText: This video leads you to believe Scotties are a very gentle, docile breed. False!  Yes as adults, when raised right they are very loving, sweet dogs. But Scotties are not the best puppies for young children.  Scotties play hard, and can be stubborn.  They didn't get the name die hard for nothing.  If you want a puppy you can cuddle and kiss, don't get a Scottie!  They are very independent and only give affection on their terms.  Don't get me wrong, I love the Scottish Terrier.  I have two, but this video makes it sound like they are the perfect dog for everyone and that just is not true.
